message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
I understand you want a larger share, but this split is more realistic. It benefits us both to settle sooner rather than later.
Let's meet in the middle of our previous offers, I'm willing to compromise.
Time is running out, Alice. This is a fair offer considering the circumstances.
I'm still willing to compromise, but I need a bit more. Inflation is eating into my share!
Alice, let's be real.  We're approaching the halfway point, and this back and forth is helping no one. I'm proposing a 50/50 split to end this fairly.
